document.full_text: college scouting is essential to the success of every n.f.l. team. for doing it as well as he did, for as long as he did, tom boisture deserves to be remembered.
document.title: remembering tom boisture, who helped build champions
lines_and_colors: college scouting is essential to the success of every n.f.l. team. for doing it as well as he did, for as long as he did, tom boisture deserves to be remembered.
